intro.2: Hello, I'm Kuba - Frontend Developer with former engineering background. I thought it's finally a time to gather and show some of my various projects.
intro.2-b: So here you are, at that a little crazy website
intro.4: OK, I know! Scroll harder to revel projects timeline.
intro.4-b: It will be easier next time, I promise
intro.4-c: You could skip it, don't you know?

portfolio-page.title: Portfolio page
portfolio-page.description: You are here! My first steps with Svelte framework. Page made as a field for experiments with anime.js and rollup. Bugged and unpredictable - pure madness.

envio.title: Envio IoT Dashboard
envio.description: Dahsboard tool dedicated for a digital label that can display any dynamic information to track entire fleet and run smoother operations.

avatar-maker.title: Avatar maker
avatar-maker.description: Showcase project, which was made to practice my new favourite React stack. It's going to be a part of something way much bigger soon!

panel-demo.title: Beauty clinic dashboard
panel-demo.description: Dashboard panel created to maintain beauty's clinic database. Here's available demo version with mocked data. Try it and order one NOW!

dgprawo.title: Kancelaria Radcy Prawnego
dgprawo.description: My first ordered, custom-made website. Made with pure HTML, CSS and a pinch of JS.

genji.title: Genji Simulator Game
genji.description: Simple, one click game inspired by Overwatch meme. Unfortunately currently is blocked at Google Play.

bastion-robot.title: Robotic arm
bastion-robot.description: Robotic arm fully designed and made by myself thanks to the miracle of 3D printing. Robot with forward kinematics and pariatly inverted control with marvelous ability to play ♪ music ♪ on it's stepper motors.
